title: shasan
author: shasan
content: What happened:: Spreading malware by saying 10BTC FreeReference Link: Code:https://docs.google.com/drawings/d/1gInFokWeIuIeagzm8ASjm3wds94E-uz2P7MB9Ul8pxs/preview?7244861176651518184744840785381721640&urp=gmail_linkAdditional Notes: I am receiving an email from a few days where they are offering 10BTC free. I have seen it earlier but was busy checking the malware. Today I opened it and came to know they are attacked by their malware.Proof of malware:

comments.author: DaveF
comments.body: The link is not working now, but it's not a surprise that a random email with a google docs link would be spreading something bad.Malware / deposit to withdraw scam / ponzi / whatever nothing good can happen when you click that link.But, shasan, if you are going to post and discuss every scam & malware email you are going to be doing this as a full time job.-Dave

comments.author: Edwardard
comments.body: Quote from: DaveF on December 01, 2022, 02:07:55 AMif you are going to post and discuss every scam & malware email you are going to be doing this as a full time job.True, thats going to be a lifelong job. Ppl should already be smart enough to not fall in so called "low-level scams" otherwise there would be too much never ending accusations against the investor-based games board itself (a board full of ponzi scams). Even scams/hacks are not moderated by the mods here since they know "the weakest end in any chain of security is not the security itself but the person operating it". We are responsible for our own acts. Stay smart, stay safu!

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: DaveF on December 01, 2022, 02:07:55 AMThe link is not working now, but it's not a surprise that a random email with a google docs link would be spreading something bad.Malware / deposit to withdraw scam / ponzi / whatever nothing good can happen when you click that link.But, shasan, if you are going to post and discuss every scam & malware email you are going to be doing this as a full time job.-DaveI receive at least 10 emails with links with an attached spreadsheet with similar offers I just hit the spam button and that's it, there's nothing new on this, the biggest regret is I participated in these useless that ask my email, one-way or the other we all receive emails like this so hit the spam button and besides if there are malware attached to it it will be disabled by Google if many will report the attachment, but still good for posting it here for the sake of newbies.
